long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Claros is an AI-powered shopping assistant that helps you make the best buying decisions.

When you’re on a product page, Claros instantly summarizes reviews from trusted sources like Reddit, Amazon, Wirecutter, and Consumer Reports. It also finds other merchants selling the same product for cheaper in case you'd rather buy there!

Get a quick sense of how a product is rated, and discover alternative deals across multiple stores to save money—all in one convenient popup.

✔ Get summaries of reviews for a product from sources like Reddit, Amazon, Wirecutter, Consumer Reports, and more!

✔ Find better deals for the same product you're considering

✔ Use the linked Claros webapp to find better brands to buy from and ask any shopping questions!

If this sounds useful, start shopping with Claros today! 

Disclaimer: Claros uses affiliate links when suggesting products at better prices to offset the cost of ai summarization, using it's own affiliate network (which spans Amazon, Shopify, and other brands).
